com.aby.knight

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KnightsMove

    public interface Game
    The Game interface will be implemented by the Knight Tour game. It provides methods which are generalizations to implement backtracking. It uses the iterator pattern to access positions available from a given position
    Author:
    Aby
